meanings.definition: A portion of something divided among a number of people.
meanings.sent1: She received two shares of the cake at the party.
meanings.sent2: The company's shares are divided among its employees.
meanings.sent3: The shares of pizza were quickly claimed by the hungry kids.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a share of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The shares of sunlight peeked through the clouds.

meanings.definition: To have a part in something with others.
meanings.sent1: He shares his toys with his little sister.
meanings.sent2: They share the responsibility of taking care of the garden.
meanings.sent3: The birds share the tree branches peacefully.
meanings.sent4: The students share their ideas during group projects.
meanings.sent5: She shares her umbrella with a stranger in the rain.

meanings.sent1: She shares her exciting news with her best friend.
meanings.sent2: He shares his thoughts on the book with the class.
meanings.sent3: The cat shares its adventures with the curious dog.
meanings.sent4: The author shares a tale of mystery and intrigue.
meanings.sent5: The teacher shares knowledge with eager students.
